StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap [Accession Number phs xxxxxx]. Samples and associated data for the “Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes” dataset were provided by Faruk Hadziselimovic, M.D., and his colleagues. This study was supported in part by the European Social Fund under the Global Grant measure. Work in the group of Michael B. Stadler, Ph.D, is supported by funding from the MetastasiX project of SystemsX.ch. We thank Manuel Kohler, Department of Biosystems Science and Engineering (D-BSSE), ETH Zurich for helping us perform RNA sequencing.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
The use of the dataset entitled "Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes” is restricted to “Genetic Studies Only” on Cryptorchidism. Use of these data to conduct non-genetic research is prohibited.
All requestors and data users must provide a local Institutional Review Board (IRB) letter from their respective institution approving conduct of the proposed research project. The IRB letter must explicitly reference the use of the "Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes” dataset.
Use of the “Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes" dataset also requires dissemination of the results of your study to the scientific community by means of publication.
The use of this dataset is restricted to not-for-profit organizations.
The annual progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to the "Differential Gene Expression in Cryptorchid Testes” dataset and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may also have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cryptorchidism, IRB, PUB, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CRYPT-IRB-PUB-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cryptorchidism. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
